entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tiered compilation support for dynamic methods #73594
  • CustomAttributeDecoderTests.TestCustomAttributeDecoderUsingReflection test fails on mono #73593
    Future
  • GC Perf Regression: Decommit Behavior for Regions Is Causing Regressions in Microbenchmarks #73592
    7.0.0
  • Debugger c# net 7 not native file request broken AND Breakpoint error #73591
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Random Application Hangs at Task.Run #73590
  • ReadAsMultipartAsync() cannot read a valid multipart content (MIME multipart message is not complete) #73587
  • [API Proposal]: Modify Float/Double Equals and CompareTo to reflect -0.0 and +0.0 difference and ordering #73583
  • VB 2019 SerialPortNames duplicate port names #73576
  • [armel/tizen] Broken build #73571
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables 6.0.1 fails reading environment variables #73570
  • [API Proposal]: IRandom interface (which Random and RandomNumberGenerator implement) #73567
  • WebSocketHandle always adds "known" request headers to connection headers even if the caller specified these themselves, duplicating entries. #73564
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10060): A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, #73561
  • [jitstress] System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64Int64SumTest fails frequently on win-x86 #73559
    7.0.0
  • Tracking allocations in async methods #73557
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\hugeSimpleExpr1\\hugeSimpleExpr1.cmd #73545
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Breaking R2R (crossgen2) input bubble promise results leads to corrupted execution #71131
    7.0.0
  • Regression in QuickSortSpan / Perf_Integer.ToByteArray benchmark #59414
    7.0.0
  • Potential performance regression in Array.Sort for arrays of reference types #59149
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #67913
    7.0.0
  • Update the XML docs for IComparisonOperators and implementing types #64463
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #65511
    7.0.0
  • Intrinsics parity with x64 for Arm64 #70533
    7.0.0
  • Enable platform agnostic SIMD support for vector #70532
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.PrivateUri.Tests.UriRelativeResolutionTest.Uri_Unicode_SurrogatePairs_Scheme #70972
    7.0.0
  • float parsing benchmarks have regressed on 32 bit platforms #66838
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorConvert.Convert_ulong_double has regressed a lot on x86 #66832
    7.0.0
  • Parsing integers has regressed on arm32 #67974
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Int64 on arm64 #69257
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_UInt64 #71771
    7.0.0
  • Bitwise operations on enum's used in generics not working despite the constraint being applied #73579
  • methodtable.cpp Assert failure: fieldSize != (unsigned int)-1 #64544
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Additional span overloads for asymmetric signing and encryption #68767
    8.0.0
  • Unable to bind Dictionary with key type "Enum" when key string case is different #71185
    Future
  • Stepping into R2R ends up in SIGBUS #72692
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tests fails on iOS/tvOS #51400
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Previous frames on call stack have different line location on Firefox and Chrome #70281
    7.0.0
  • Provide block counts in tiered compilation from R2R images #13672
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Configure the Diagnostic Server using DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts #73011
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Assert failure: Verify_TypeLayout 'System.Numerics.Vector`1' failed to verify type layout #60036
    7.0.0
  • Obsolete SerializationFormat.Binary in DataTable/DataSet and put it behind an appcontext switch #39289
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #70496
    7.0.0
  • Hot Reload breaks `MethodInfo` equality #69427
    7.0.0
  • Native AOT is too resource hungry #73522
    Future
  • Bug when renaming a DataTable column to the same name, but with different case #73575
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_RandomAccess #66465
    7.0.0
  • Fix framework pack NuGet package licenseUrl #3823
    7.0.0
  • System.Xml work planned for .NET 7 #64602
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.dll has wrong modified date #73544
  • [Android][x86] System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests.NFloatTests failed #65557
    Future
  • Event Log message is not shown in the way it is sent #72245
    7.0.0
  • Cache most popular string objects in String.InternalSubString #73540
    8.0.0
  • iOS developers can produce smaller apps when targeting .NET6 #45832
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.SpanTests.ReadOnlySpanTests.TestMatchLastIndexOfAny_TwoByte #71604
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.SpanTests.ReadOnlySpanTests.TestMatchTwo_Char #72427
    7.0.0
  • Package compatibility check target fails to parse #73463
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect nullable annotations on most MemoryExtensions methods #73457
    7.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in XML found during nullability annotations #41061
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #73388
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Error when reading trailing headers (unit tests) #46263
    7.0.0
  • "Clean up old artifacts owned by root" installer CI step failing #58168
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Tests crashing on Mono #58828
    7.0.0
  • Crypto exception on startup with self-signed cert in Windows container #70386
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add logging callback to DAC EnumMemoryRegion API #73599
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Disable useless warnings #73598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix up doc comments #73597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Move stable jobs from runtime-staging to runtime #73596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "Disable GetGCMemoryInfo on arm (#73477)" #73595
  • Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #73589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Avoid additional Pipes msbuild invocation and clean-up project #73588
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm-ep] Remove old sample and JS-based diagnostics #73586
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.1 as well #73585
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [PERF] Fix "x$PERF_PREREQS_INSTALLED was unexpected at this time" Error for Microbenchmarks #73584
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] minimal - asset loading for workers #73582
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [libs] Reenable System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests for mobile #73581
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [interp] bounds check fallthru in conditional branches #73580
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix credential caching on macOS #73577
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • [wasm] Wasm load crypto asset and deadlock fix #73573
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Support managed debugging when CET is enabled #73572
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix interleaved heap RW commit failure handling #73566
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update MsQuic and use ConnectionCloseStatus in StreamShutdown #73563
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Fix liveness for dependently promoted TYP_LONGs on x86 #73562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Succeed rather than skip JSON tests #73560
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] crypto trying to reproduce deadlock #73558
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73556
    area-System.Memory
  • Delete the "Generating compatible code" message #73554
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete some .NET Nativisms #73553
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix issue#37970 #73552
    area-Serialization
  • fix a couple issues with Microsoft.XmlSerailizer.Generator #73550
    area-Serialization
  • Fix ASAN mismatch #73549
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make public EventBookmark's constructor and BookmarkText property #73548
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add extra NativeAOT test legs #73547
  • Expand NativeAOT testing platforms #73546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Refactor input bubble checks to work in non-composite scenarios #73350
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Revert "Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or fi… #73551
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Implement additional asymmetric signature and encryption overloads #73502
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • fixes #71185 #71926
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • `runtime-staging`: Enable failed tests on stable jobs to fail the job #73400
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [iOS] Enable skipped System.Threading tests #73498
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm][debugger] Create a method to compare previous frames on call stack for firefox #73000
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix IMPORTS and flat API in createDotnetRuntime callback parameter #73565
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Use DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts to configure Diagnostic Server #73370
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix issue where calculation of valuetypeshapecharacteristic on Arm64 does not match native runtime #73406
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009
    area-System.Reflection
  • Disable GetGCMemoryInfo on arm #73477
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix aka.ms links in build promotion for VSDROP #73483
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #73380
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Improve idle timeout tests #73228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix packaging compat target generation #73555
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix nullable annotations on IEquatable/IComparable constraints #73495
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • Add null checks in various XML methods #73243
    area-System.Xml
  • Recoup some of the perf losses in cold start serialization #73497
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add unit test for HTTP3 trailing headers. #73460
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Delete some old Jenkins scripts #73514
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve IndexOf(char, OrdinalIgnoreCase) #73533
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • [mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #73480
    area-GC-mono
  • [NativeAot] Try re-enabling S.C.Concurrent tests #73526
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • shortcut string replace if oldvalue is longer than count #73543
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, Future
  • Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder #72561
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.0
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory #73408
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • COSE: Add documentation and exception correction #73394
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #73014
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • CI: Add support in yml for detecting darc dependency changes in `eng/Version.Details.xml` #73435
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Adding cultureName to GeneratedRegexAttribute #73490
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Support TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file #73087
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] crypto deadlock CI test #73519
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET
  • PlatformNotSupportedException for UNIX domain sockets on iOS/tvOS #73374
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement initial capacity for AsnWriter #73535
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Allow child process reaping by other thread(library) #70705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add custom JsonConverter for BinaryData that converts to Base64 string #73448
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    linkable-framework
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix some racy tests #73524
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Debugging Span.Reverse #73157
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [Android] Enable ThreadPoolCanPickUpOneOrMoreWorkItemsWhenThreadIsAvailable test #73487
    area-System.Threading
  • [Mono] Enable X86Base.Pause test only when LLVM is enabled #73318
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable JitDisasm in Release #73365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Set up `HttpClient` for `ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync` #73387
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] asset loading for workers #73484

    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Support network status information #71941
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Update javascript API usage in samples and tests #73367

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NuGet config not copied when running the workload command under sudo on Arm64 #27029
  • .NET Core WPF app doesn't correctly list NativeReference in manifest file #27027
  • [Loc]With .NET 7 rc.1 installed on locale OS, some strings are unlocalized during test dotnet-format in cli. #27019

Closed

  • [ApiCompat] Enable nullable reference types #25760

PullRequests

Created

  • [No Review] Support left and right names for assembly set #27024
  • Removed own implementation of Reporter in `TemplateEngine.Cli` #27021
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix the loc build and the CI build #27030
    Area-Infrastructure
  • CFS tool configuration for templating testfile #27020
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable nullable for the mapper types and code clean-up #26989
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update the method for removing periods #26977

Updated

  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj / Slns #26808
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26991
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Extension await operator to address scoped ConfigureAwait #2649
    Backlog
  • [Proposal] Extend with expression to anonymous type #3530
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce cascading errors when record inherits from non-record #63270
  • SelectMany returning `null` crashes the generator driver #63266
  • Unexpected escape analysis behavior for interpolated string with variable of local scope #63262
  • IDE0029 and IDE0030 have the same title #63259
  • MethodNotFoundException when running RoslynDeployment on main #63258

Closed

  • Test plan for "Default Interface Implementation of static members" feature #60968
    17.4
  • Code CleanUp doesnt not work as expected #62727
    17.4
  • File and required modifiers are missing from CSharpAccessibilityFacts.GetAccessibilityAndModifiers #62371
    17.4
  • Configure code style does nothing, does not apply to editorconfig #63216

PullRequests

Created

  • EnC: Log deltas and messages to disk #63269
    Area-Interactive
  • Document build correctness leg #63268
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Dont throw on null return #63267
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: try to use the document snapshot when validating PDB checksum #63265
    Area-Interactive
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check interpolated string arguments in Binder.GetValEscape() #63263
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix IDE0053 (Use expression body for lambdas) for command-line builds #63260
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Make bootstrap failures easier to debug #63236
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator not working correctly with 'required' #62945
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move PatternMatching*Tests to Emit2 #63261
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Rename internal 'LanguageServices' namespace to not collide with new 'LanguageServices' type. #63249
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow using ScopedRef in source #63046
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move options subsystem over to using SolutionService snapshots. #63245
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute in VB #63194
    Area-Compilers
  • Test PDB checksums emitted for source generated files #63038
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63250
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Fix analyzer action state tracking for partial analysis #63206
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Avoid resolving parameter.Type in ReportParameterErrors() #63142
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the ANCM error when an app fails to start #43152
    7.0-rc1
  • What's the best choice for a non-root port for ASP.NET Core? #43149
  • [net7] Documentation updates for filters, OpenAPI, authentication #43145
  • [SignalR][TS Client] Typesafe connection #43144
  • Add overload with `AuthenticationProperties` to `SignInManager.ExternalLoginSignInAsync` #43138
  • Sessions - How to report / capture engagement information. #43137
    Discussions
  • Allow specifying host and port or port in ASPNETCORE_URLS #43135

Closed

  • [Feature Request] gRPC does not have HTTP protocol version negotiation in unencrypted environments #42948
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Allow writing to user-secrets from code #43139
    Discussions
  • Is there a way to drag diagram to design via blazor? #42976
  • [Blazor Server] Warn developer if the <base/> tag is missing from the root layout #43146
  • SignalR connections start slower and slower in Firefox in VS 2022 (up to 60 seconds) #40453
    7.0-rc1
  • WebApplicationBuilder should not Require wwwroot Directory #38857
    7.0-rc1
  • Roll back the template to use an organized structure #43126
  • Error in new componet in blazor #43127

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] macOS dev-certs - Handle keychain paths with spaces #43148
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, 6.0.x
  • Try to update SDK version after updating arcade #43147
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d5773b7` to `bbd5404` #43140
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dd7a9d2` to `5b909be` #43141
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Obsolete LeakTrackingObjectPool and LeakTrackingObjectPoolProvider #43106
    area-runtime
  • Remove IsAvailable check on CommitAsync. #43059
    area-runtime
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime
  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
    area-web-frameworks
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • Add analyzer to suggest top level route registration #42937
    area-infrastructure
  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security, api-suggestion
  • Fix route handler analyzer test culture warnings #43107
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Add overload with `AuthenticationProperties` to `SignInManager.ExternalLoginSignInAsync` #43132
    area-identity, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Make symbol store settings output more user friendly #3271
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Allow `sos <cmd>` to be used consistently across all debuggers/hosts #3266

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] LineBreakMode doesn't work on Button #9277
  • Reusable / extendable version of SecureStorage? (and for that matter - other relevant packages as well) #9276
  • Grid rows within CollectionView are all blank (only in Release mode) #9275
  • FlexLayout not rendering content #9274
  • Title view not displayed after navigating shell tabs #9269
  • .SVG files not showing up on IOS #9265
  • Date format DatePicker wrong in Windows #9255
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Handle the transient errors in efcore when using Cosmos DB #28629
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Handle column type ANY #28628
  • Query: Allow use of navigations in ExecuteUpdate set values #28627
  • Entity splitting: allow specifying more facets on the fragments #28625
  • Redundant inner join when I'm using GroupBy() #28622
  • Support jsonpath querying #28616
  • Cannot build efcore #28614

Closed

  • EF 6.0.6 Migrations identity column exception #28617
  • Is it possible to use in-memory DB with DbContext pooling in a multi-tenant environment? #28565
  • Global query filter with boolean prevents use of indexes #28527
  • @asante07 that error means you actually connect to the database Server. Suggest you create a issue with proper information about your environment. #28517
  • Could I ReplaceService for create base Conventions #28463
  • Change database name in runtime using entity framework core and .net core6 #28620
  • dotnet ef migrations bundle fails with --runtime linux-arm64 #28418
  • EF core should probably clear meaningless parentheses in generated sql queries #28615
  • How can I dynamically create a sequence? #28610

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement ExecuteUpdate #28626
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.0.0-preview2.22096.2 to 5.0.0 #28624
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Castle.Core from 5.0.0 to 5.1.0 #28623
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add test for runtime model generation with proxies #28621

Updated

  • Scaffolding: Create default templates #28549

entry.content:
